sentences.sContent: On Sunday, he won the 200-meter individual medley and said he needs more practice.
sentences.sContent_eng: On Sunday, he won the 200-meter individual medley and said he needs more practice.
sentences.sCn: 星期天，他赢得了200米个人混合泳，并表示他需要更多的练习。

sentences.sContent: She came in with the world record in the 400 individual medley but settled for bronze.
sentences.sContent_eng: She came in with the world record in the 400 individual medley but settled for bronze.
sentences.sCn: 而在400米个人混合泳的比赛中，她破了世界纪录却还是只获得了银牌。

sentences.sContent: Yes. In medley relays, each swimmer swims one stroke for the set distance; the order is back-stroke, breast-stroke, butterfly and freestyle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes. In medley relays, each swimmer swims one stroke for the set distance; the order is back-stroke, breast-stroke, butterfly and freestyle.
sentences.sCn: 是的，在混合泳接力赛中，每位运动员以一种姿势游一定距离，顺序依次是斧正游泳、蛙泳、蝶泳和自由泳。

phrases.pCn: 个人混合泳，个人混和式

trans.tranOther: a group of songs or tunes sung or played one after the other as a single piece of music
